title: SKGLView darker than SKCanvasView
body:
Swapping SKGLView in for SKCanvasView, changing nothing else in the code (in particular, the exact same draw routine), results in 60% darker output.

        <!--<skia:SKCanvasView PaintSurface="OnCanvasViewPaintSurface" />-->
        <skia:SKGLView PaintSurface="OnCanvasViewPaintSurface" />

![](https://us.v-cdn.net/5019960/uploads/editor/8d/owa3v1i6ept0.png "")
